```{r echo = FALSE}
WorldData %>% 
  select(
    name,
    pop_est) %>% 
  arrange(desc(pop_est)) %>% 
  head(5) %>% 
  ggplot() + 
  geom_col(aes(x = pop_est, y = forcats::fct_reorder(name, pop_est))) +
  xlab("Bevölkerung") +
  ylab("")

```

```{r}
WorldData %>% 
  select(
    continent,
    pop_est_dens,
    gdp_cap_est,
    life_exp,
    well_being,
    inequality,
    HPI) %>% 
  group_by(continent) %>% 
  summarise(
    across(
      pop_est_dens:HPI, 
      ~round(
        mean(., na.rm = TRUE)
        ,1))) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(well_being)) %>% 
  kableExtra::kbl(
    col.names = c(
      "Kontinent",
      "Bevölkerungsdichte",
      "BIP (pro Kopf)",
      "Lebenserwartung",
      "Wohlbefinden",
      "Ungleichheit",
      "Happy Planet"),
    booktabs = T) %>% 
  kableExtra::add_header_above(c(
    " " = 4, 
    "Index" = 3)) %>% 
  kableExtra::kable_styling(latex_options = c(
    "striped",
    "scale_down",
    "reapeat_header"))


```
